00008 #include <blond/beams/Beams.h>
00009 #include <blond/constants.h>
00010 #include <blond/math_functions.h>
00011 
00012 Beams::Beams(const uint n_macroparticles, const long long intensity)
00013 {
00014 
00015     this->n_macroparticles = n_macroparticles;
00016     this->intensity = intensity;
00017     this->dt.resize(n_macroparticles);
00018     this->dE.resize(n_macroparticles);
00019     this->id = mymath::arange<int>(1, n_macroparticles + 1);
00020     this->mean_dt = this->mean_dE = 0;
00021     this->sigma_dt = this->sigma_dE = 0;
00022     this->ratio = intensity / n_macroparticles;
00023     this->epsn_rms_l = 0;
00024     this->n_macroparticles_lost = 0;
00025 }
00026 
00027 Beams::~Beams() {}
00028 
00029 uint Beams::n_macroparticles_alive()
00030 {
00031 
00032     return n_macroparticles - n_macroparticles_lost;
00033 }
00034 
00035 void Beams::statistics()
00036 {
00037     ftype m_dE, m_dt, s_dE, s_dt;
00038     m_dt = m_dE = s_dE = s_dt = 0;
00039     uint n = 0;
00040     for (int i = 0; i < (int) n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00041         if (id[i] != 0) {
00042             m_dE += dE[i];
00043             m_dt += dt[i];
00044             n++;
00045         }
00046     }
00047     mean_dE = m_dE /= n;
00048     mean_dt = m_dt /= n;
00049     for (int i = 0; i < (int) n_macroparticles; ++i) {
00050         if (id[i] != 0) {
00051             s_dE += (dE[i] - m_dE) * (dE[i] - m_dE);
00052             s_dt += (dt[i] - m_dt) * (dt[i] - m_dt);
00053         }
00054     }
00055     sigma_dE = std::sqrt(s_dE / n);
00056     sigma_dt = std::sqrt(s_dt / n);
00057 
00058     epsn_rms_l = constant::pi * sigma_dE * sigma_dt; // in eVs
00059 
00060     // Losses
00061     n_macroparticles_lost = n_macroparticles - n;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 void Beams::losses_longitudinal_cut(const ftype dt_min, const ftype dt_max)
00066 {
00067     #pragma omp parallel for
00068     for (int i = 0; i < (int)n_macroparticles; i++)
00069         id[i] = (dt[i] - dt_min) * (dt_max - dt[i]) < 0 ? 0 : id[i];
00070 }
00071 
00072 void Beams::losses_energy_cut(const ftype dE_min, const ftype dE_max)
00073 {
00074     #pragma omp parallel for
00075     for (int i = 0; i < (int)n_macroparticles; ++i)
00076         id[i] = (dE[i] - dE_min) * (dE_max - dE[i]) < 0 ? 0 : id[i];
00077 }
